UPDATE tour_bookings SET status = #{newStatus},
total_price = #{newPrice},
special_requests = #{specialRequests},
updated_at = NOW() WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId} /* 🔒 安全检查1: 只允许从pending状态转换 */ AND status = 'pending' /* 🔒 安全检查2: 只允许转换到confirmed状态 */ AND #{newStatus} = 'confirmed' /* 🔒 安全检查3: 价格合理性验证（如果提供了新价格） */
AND #{newPrice} >= 0 AND #{newPrice} <= (total_price * 10) /* 不超过原价的10倍 */
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(created_at) AS date, COUNT(*) AS orders, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN total_price ELSE 0 END) AS revenue, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 END) AS completed FROM tour_bookings WHERE DATE(created_at) BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY date

SELECT COUNT(*) as totalOrders, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN total_price ELSE 0 END) as totalRevenue, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 END) as pendingOrders, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'confirmed' THEN 1 END) as confirmedOrders, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 END) as completedOrders, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'cancelled' THEN 1 END) as cancelledOrders FROM tour_bookings WHERE created_at BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'confirmed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as confirmed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'cancelled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cancelled FROM tour_bookings

SELECT tb.tour_id as tourId, CASE WHEN tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' THEN dt.name WHEN tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' THEN gt.title ELSE 'Unknown' END as tourName, COUNT(*) as bookingCount, SUM(tb.total_price) as totalRevenue FROM tour_bookings tb LEFT JOIN day_tours dt ON tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' AND tb.tour_id = dt.day_tour_id LEFT JOIN group_tours gt ON tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' AND tb.tour_id = gt.group_tour_id WHERE tb.status IN ('confirmed', 'completed') GROUP BY tb.tour_id, tb.tour_type ORDER BY bookingCount DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) as bookings, SUM(total_price) as revenue, AVG(total_price) as averagePrice FROM tour_bookings WHERE tour_type = #{tourType} AND status IN ('confirmed', 'completed')

SELECT tb.tour_id as tourId, CASE WHEN tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' THEN dt.name WHEN tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' THEN gt.title ELSE 'Unknown' END as tourName, COUNT(*) as bookingCount, SUM(tb.total_price) as revenue, CASE WHEN tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' THEN dt.rating WHEN tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' THEN gt.rating ELSE 0 END as rating FROM tour_bookings tb LEFT JOIN day_tours dt ON tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' AND tb.tour_id = dt.day_tour_id LEFT JOIN group_tours gt ON tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' AND tb.tour_id = gt.group_tour_id WHERE tb.tour_type = #{tourType} AND tb.status IN ('confirmed', 'completed') GROUP BY tb.tour_id, tb.tour_type ORDER BY bookingCount DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT AVG(rating) FROM ( SELECT dt.rating as rating FROM tour_bookings tb JOIN day_tours dt ON tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' AND tb.tour_id = dt.day_tour_id WHERE tb.status IN ('confirmed', 'completed') UNION ALL SELECT gt.rating as rating FROM tour_bookings tb JOIN group_tours gt ON tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' AND tb.tour_id = gt.group_tour_id WHERE tb.status IN ('confirmed', 'completed') ) as all_ratings

SELECT location as destination, COUNT(*) as bookingCount, SUM(total_price) as revenue FROM tour_bookings tb LEFT JOIN day_tours dt ON tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' AND tb.tour_id = dt.day_tour_id LEFT JOIN group_tours gt ON tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' AND tb.tour_id = gt.group_tour_id WHERE tb.status IN ('confirmed', 'completed') AND (dt.location IS NOT NULL OR gt.location IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY COALESCE(dt.location, gt.location) ORDER BY bookingCount DESC LIMIT 10
